nav.div: Greenon Local Schools » School Closure » Distance Learning » Enrichment Resources

span.br:
Protect Like a Knight Coloring Sheet
Print a copy of the Protect Like a Knight Coloring sheet. Email it to Mr. Silvus at bsilvus@greenonschools.org with your child's first name and teacher's name - Mr. Silvus will share a few coloring sheets each day!
ABC Mouse (Preschool through 2nd Grade)

a.title: Click here to access ABC Mouse.

span.span: Free at-home access to ABC Mouse during the school closure.

a.title: Click here for the Greenon Schools access code for Age of Learning programs.

span.a: Click here for the Greenon Schools access information.

Click here to access Adventure Academy.

span.span: Free at-home access to ABC Mouse during the school closure.

a.title: Click here for the Greenon Schools access code for Age of Learning programs.

span.a: Click here for the Greenon Schools access information.
span.br:
Reading IQ (Preschool through 6th Grade)
Free at-home access to ABC Mouse during the school closure. Click here for the Greenon Schools access information.
INFOhio MVECA
INFOhio Resources.
PBS Learning
Bring the world to your home.
Chrome Music Lab
Allows students to make their own music
Khan Academy Kids
Video learning access.
Teach Your Monster to Read
Free online learning to read resource
GoNoodle
Dance videos, relaxation videos, educational videos.
Dairy Farm Tour
Take a Dairy Farm Tour from home.
Ranger Rick
Free access to the Ranger Rick website a great resource of animal information.
Brain Pop
Educational videos from math, science, art, health, social emotional, etc.
Ohio Means Jobs Backpack
Career education information.
Spin and Spell Easter Eggs
A fun way to use plastic Easter eggs to practice spelling, rhyming and reading sight words.
AP Book List
A list of books that have appeared on the AP Literature Exam since 1971.
STEM Activities
A list of STEM resources and activities from the Ohio Oil and Gas Energy Education Program.
Free Online Events and Activities
A list of free online events and activities for kids at home.
Children's Authors Read-Alouds
A big list of children's authors doing online read-alouds and activities.
Imagineering in a Box
A free interactive lesson in theme park design and engineering from Disney, Khan Academy, and Pixar.
Play Games Online with Friends
Play popular board and card games with friends online.
Free 30 Day Trial for Scribd
Read for free for 30 days with Scribd.
Lunch Doodles with Mo Willems
The Kennedy Center for the Arts hosts a lunch doodle with Author and Illustrator Mo Willems each weekday at 1 p.m.
Operation StoryTime!
Listen to some of your favorite authors read their stories for #OperationStoryTime!
Skype a Scientist
Request a Skype session with a scientist from a number of specialties.
FREE Online Courses from Ivy League Schools
A list of 500 free online courses offered from Brown, Columbia, Cornell, Dartmouth, Harvard, Penn, Princeton, and Yale.
30 Virtual Field Trips
A list of 30 virtual field trips for families.
Cincinnati Zoo 3 p.m. Home Safari
The Cincinnati Zoo will do a 3 pm Home Safari video on Facebook every weekday at 3 p.m.
FREE Educational Subscriptions
A list of educational companies offering free subscriptions for families during the school closure.
150+ Enrichment Ideas for Students at Home
More than 150 ideas for enrichment for students while families are home during the closure.
Virtual Museum Tours
Take a virtual tour of 12 famous museums
Scholastic Lesson Plans
Learn at home Lesson Plans from Scholastic for Pre-K and Kindergarten, 1st and 2nd grades, 3rd through 5th grades, and 6th grade+.
50 Staycation Ideas
A list of 50 activities for families during the three-week closure.
Activities with Kids
A list of fun activities families can do at home during the school closure.
